title: Pixel 3 XL dropping bluetooth connections?
content: My phones is constantly dropping BT connections, this occurs with multiple devices (2 BT headsets) 2 car connections, as well as a ipad connection.  Once they drop it's incredibly difficult to reconnect, sometimes restarting the phone and device multiple times with no success.  I've tried all TS steps... removing devices and re-adding one at a time.  Starting in "Safe Mode" makes no changes either.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
